name: Salvage Drone
desc: an salvage drone. its about as effective as an normal crew at salvageing, but is worthless at everything else

name: Combat Drone
desc: Combat drones have very effective wepons. its a shame they have an tendincy to walk stright into kill boxes and other fortafications. without the flexability normal combations have, they most be deployed in numbers to beable to overcome a foe.

desc: an spicalized survey drone. its exstreamly effective at takeing takeing samplies from the ground, and exsploring. mush more so then normal crew
